senses.sense_definition: That operates to produce an effect; functioning, effective, or active.

examples.text: The psychologist explained the principles of <w>operant</w> conditioning to the students.
We need to find an <w>operant</w> solution that actively resolves the issue.

senses.sense_definition: Any of a class of behaviors that produce consequences by operating or acting upon the environment.

examples.text: In the experiment, pressing the lever was the <w>operant</w> that resulted in a reward.
Skinner defined a verbal <w>operant</w> as a unit of language behavior.

senses.sense_definition: An operative person or thing that performs a function.

examples.text: He was a key <w>operant</w> in the complex machinery of the organization.
The chemical acts as an <w>operant</w> to speed up the reaction.
